pdhp239:1: khāntī paramaṁ tapo titikkhā nibbāṇaṁ paramaṁ vadanti buddhā ।
pdhp239:2: na hi pravrajito paropaghātī śamaṇo hoti pare vihesayāno ।।
pdhp240:1: ahiṁsakā ye munayo niccaṁ kāyena saṁvṛtā ।
pdhp240:2: te yānti accutaṁ ṭṭhāṇaṁ yattha gantā na śocati ।।
pdhp241:2: yesāṁ divā ca rātto ca ahiṁsāya rato mano ।।
pdhp242:2: yesāṁ divā ca rātto ca bhāvanāya rato mano ।।
pdhp243:2: yesāṁ divā ca rātto ca niccaṁ kāyagatā satī ।।
pdhp244:2: devā pi tesaṁ prihayanti saṁbuddhānāṁ satīmatāṁ ।।
pdhp245:1: aranne yadi vā ggrāme ninne vā yadi vā thale ।
pdhp245:2: yattha arahanto viharaṁti taṁ bhomaṁ rāmaṇīyakaṁ ।।
pdhp246:1: ekaṁ pi ce prāṇam aduṣṭacitto mettāyate kuśalī tena hoti ।
pdhp246:2: sabbe ca prāṇe manasā ’nukaṁpī prabhūtam ayiro prakaroti puṁñaṁ ।।
pdhp247:1: ye sattaśaṇḍāṁ paṭhaviṁ vijettā rājariṣayo yajamānā ’nupariyagu ।
pdhp247:3: mettassa cittassa subhāvitassa kalāṁ pi te nānubhavanti soḍaśiṁ ।
pdhp248:1: yo ’tha metteṇa cittena sabbe prāṇe nukaṁpati ।
pdhp248:2: mettaṁ se sabbabhūtesu veraṁ tassa na kenaci ।।
pdhp249:1: yassa sabbe ahorātte ahiṁsāya rato mano ।
pdhp249:2: mettaṁ se sabbabhūtesu veraṁ tassa na kenaci ।।
pdhp250:1: yassa sabbe ahorātte bhāvanāya rato mano ।
pdhp250:2: mettaṁ se sabbabhūtesu veraṁ tassa na kenaci ।।
pdhp251:1: yassa sabbe ahorātte niccaṁ kāyagatā satī ।
pdhp251:2: mettaṁ se sabbabhūtesu veraṁ tassa na kenaci ।।
pdhp252:1: yo na hanti na ghāteti na jināti na jāpaye ।
pdhp252:2: mettaṁ se sabbabhūtesu veraṁ tassa na kenaci ।।
pdhp253:1: na hi vereṇa verāṇi śāmantīha kadācanaṁ ।
pdhp253:2: avereṇa tu śāmaṁti esa dhaṁmo sanātano ।।
pdhp254:1: pare ca na vijānaṁti vayam ettha jayāmatha ।
pdhp254:2: ye ca tattha vijānaṁti tato śāṁmaṁti medhakā ।।
pdhp257:1: susukhaṁ vata jīvāmo yesaṁ no nāsti kiṁcanaṁ ।
pdhp258:1: yathā bubbudakaṁ paśśe yathā paśśe marīcikaṁ ।
pdhp258:2: evaṁ lokaṁ avecchānam maccurājā na paśśati ।।
pdhp260:1: jihmaṁ ca driṣṭā dukhitaṁ ca vyādhitaṁ pretañ ca driṣṭā na cirassa mānavo ।
pdhp260:2: saṁvego tīppe (?) vipulo (?) ajāyatha acchecchi dhīro gṛhibandhanāni ।।
